column2: I have inherited debts from my predecessor - how should I handle them?
I did not take out this loan - refuse to acknowledge it!
How much of a loan should I take out? Interest payments are around 10% a year until paid off in full.
Creditor Arrives with a mercenary company
Your creditor has arrived at your capital with a sizeable force. Given the direction the war has taken, this can only mean a few things.
Are they intending to collect before the inevitable?

The sight of an army approaching the capital was not met with optimism. Yet to your surprise, it seems good fortunes have arrived - my creditor has sent troops, out of self-interest for the debt I owe, hoping to turn the tide of the war.
